series.title: Breaking Bad
series.description: A chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine with a former student to secure his family's future.

episodes.title: Pilot
episodes.description: Diagnosed with lung cancer, high-school chemistry teacher Walter White teams with ex-student Jesse to cook meth in an RV, using science--and sudden violence--to secure their first batch and escape two lethal dealers.

episodes.title: Cat's in the Bag...
episodes.description: One body dissolves in acid while another dealer lies captive. Walt and Jesse scramble to erase evidence, and Walt faces whether he can kill to keep the fledgling operation--and Jesse--safe.

episodes.title: ...And the Bag's in the River
episodes.description: Chemo looming, Walt chains wounded Krazy-8 in Jesse's basement, weighing murder against morality. A smashed dinner plate decides his darkest step yet.

episodes.title: Cancer Man
episodes.description: Walt's diagnosis rocks the family while flashbacks reveal how Gray Matter upended his career. Resentment nudges him further into crime as Hank's DEA war stories fascinate Walt Jr.

episodes.title: Gray Matter
episodes.description: Ex-partners Elliott and Gretchen offer to fund treatment, but pride makes Walt refuse. Cash-strapped, he reignites the meth venture while Skyler digs into Jesse's drug past.

episodes.title: Crazy Handful of Nothin'
episodes.description: Shaved and reborn as Heisenberg, Walt crashes Tuco's lair with explosive mercury fulminate, swapping chemistry for intimidation. The violent payoff bankrolls chemo but draws Hank's attention.

episodes.title: A No-Rough-Stuff-Type Deal
episodes.description: Walter takes a bold step in expanding his operation, forcing Jesse to secure crucial supplies in a risky heist. Meanwhile, Skyler's suspicions continue to grow.

episodes.title: Seven Thirty-Seven
episodes.description: After a violent encounter with Tuco, Walter and Jesse realize the dangers of their business and plot their next move. Meanwhile, Skyler grows more suspicious of Walter's behavior.

episodes.title: Grilled
episodes.description: Walter and Jesse find themselves trapped in a deadly standoff with Tuco, fighting to survive. Meanwhile, Hank's search for the missing duo leads him closer to the truth.

episodes.title: Bit by a Dead Bee
episodes.description: Walter and Jesse scramble to cover their tracks after their ordeal with Tuco, each taking drastic measures to avoid suspicion. Meanwhile, Hank grows increasingly determined to uncover the truth.

episodes.title: Down
episodes.description: As Jesse faces the consequences of his actions, Walter struggles to keep his double life from falling apart. Meanwhile, Skyler's growing distrust pushes their marriage to the breaking point.

episodes.title: Breakage
episodes.description: As Walter expands his operation, Jesse takes on more responsibility--but struggles to maintain control. Meanwhile, Hank grapples with PTSD from his recent encounter, and Skyler makes a bold decision.

episodes.title: Peekaboo
episodes.description: Jesse tracks down a drug thief, leading to a harrowing encounter. Meanwhile, Walter manipulates his way out of a problem at home as his double life puts further strain on his marriage.

episodes.title: Negro y Azul
episodes.description: As Walter's growing reputation in the drug trade sparks dangerous attention, Jesse tries to prove himself as a leader. Meanwhile, Skyler makes an unexpected connection at work, and Hank struggles to adjust to his new assignment.

series.title: Game of Thrones
series.description: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

episodes.title: Winter Is Coming
episodes.description: Lord Eddard Stark is concerned by news of a deserter from the Night's Watch; King Robert I Baratheon and the Lannisters arrive at Winterfell; the exiled Prince Viserys Targaryen forges a powerful new alliance.

episodes.title: The Kingsroad
episodes.description: While Bran recovers from his fall, Ned takes only his daughters to King's Landing. Jon Snow goes with his uncle Benjen to the Wall. Tyrion joins them.

episodes.title: Lord Snow
episodes.description: Jon begins his training with the Night's Watch; Ned confronts his past and future at King's Landing; Daenerys finds herself at odds with Viserys.

episodes.title: Cripples, Bastards, and Broken Things
episodes.description: Eddard investigates Jon Arryn's murder. Jon befriends Samwell Tarly, a coward who has come to join the Night's Watch.

episodes.title: The Wolf and the Lion
episodes.description: Catelyn has captured Tyrion and plans to bring him to her sister, Lysa Arryn, at the Vale, to be tried for his supposed crimes against Bran. Robert plans to have Daenerys killed, but Eddard refuses to be a part of it and quits.

episodes.title: A Golden Crown
episodes.description: While recovering from his battle with Jaime, Eddard is forced to run the kingdom while Robert goes hunting. Tyrion demands a trial by combat for his freedom. Viserys is losing his patience with Drogo.

episodes.title: You Win or You Die
episodes.description: Robert has been injured while hunting and is dying. Jon and the others finally take their vows to the Night's Watch. A man, sent by Robert, is captured for trying to poison Daenerys. Furious, Drogo vows to attack the Seven Kingdoms.

episodes.title: The Pointy End
episodes.description: The Lannisters press their advantage over the Starks; Robb rallies his father's northern allies and heads south to war; The White Walkers attack the Wall; Tyrion returns to his father with some new friends.

episodes.title: Baelor
episodes.description: Robb goes to war against the Lannisters. Jon finds himself struggling on deciding if his place is with Robb or the Night's Watch. Drogo has fallen ill from a fresh battle wound. Daenerys is desperate to save him.

episodes.title: Fire and Blood
episodes.description: Robb vows to get revenge on the Lannisters. Jon must officially decide if his place is with Robb or the Night's Watch. Daenerys says her final goodbye to Drogo.

episodes.title: The North Remembers
episodes.description: Tyrion arrives at King's Landing to take his father's place as Hand of the King. Stannis Baratheon plans to take the Iron Throne for his own. Robb tries to decide his next move in the war. The Night's Watch arrive at the house of Craster.

episodes.title: The Night Lands
episodes.description: Arya makes friends with Gendry. Tyrion tries to take control of the Small Council. Theon arrives at his home, Pyke, in order to persuade his father into helping Robb with the war. Jon tries to investigate Craster's secret.

episodes.title: What Is Dead May Never Die
episodes.description: Tyrion tries to see who he can trust in the Small Council. Catelyn visits Renly to try and persuade him to join Robb in the war. Theon must decide if his loyalties lie with his own family or with Robb.

episodes.title: Garden of Bones
episodes.description: Lord Baelish arrives at Renly's camp just before he faces off against Stannis. Daenerys and her company are welcomed into the city of Qarth. Arya, Gendry, and Hot Pie find themselves imprisoned at Harrenhal.

episodes.title: The Ghost of Harrenhal
episodes.description: Tyrion investigates a secret weapon that King Joffrey plans to use against Stannis. Meanwhile, as a token for saving his life, Jaqen H'ghar offers to kill three people that Arya chooses.

episodes.title: The Old Gods and the New
episodes.description: Theon seizes control of Winterfell. Jon captures a wildling named Ygritte. The people of King's Landing begin to turn against King Joffrey. Daenerys looks to buy ships to sail for the Seven Kingdoms.

episodes.title: A Man Without Honor
episodes.description: Bran and Rickon have escaped Winterfell. Theon tries to hunt them down. Daenerys' dragons have been stolen. Jon travels through the wilderness with Ygritte as his prisoner. Sansa has bled and is now ready to have Joffrey's children.

episodes.title: The Prince of Winterfell
episodes.description: Stannis is just days from King's Landing. Tyrion prepares for his arrival. Jon and Qhorin are taken prisoner by the wildlings. Catelyn is arrested for releasing Jaime. Arya, Gendry, and Hot Pie plan to escape from Harrenhal.

episodes.title: Blackwater
episodes.description: Stannis Baratheon's fleet and army arrive at King's Landing and the battle for the city begins. Cersei plans for her and her children's future.

episodes.title: Valar Morghulis
episodes.description: Joffrey puts Sansa aside for Margaery Tyrell. Robb marries Talisa Maegyr. Jon prepares to meet Mance Rayder. Arya says farewell to Jaqen H'ghar. Daenerys tries to rescue her dragons.

episodes.title: Valar Dohaeris
episodes.description: Jon is brought before Mance Rayder, the King Beyond the Wall, while the Night's Watch survivors retreat south. In King's Landing, Tyrion asks for his reward. Littlefinger offers Sansa a way out.

episodes.title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
episodes.description: Bran and company meet Jojen and Meera Reed. Arya, Gendry, and Hot Pie meet the Brotherhood. Jaime travels through the wilderness with Brienne. Sansa confesses her true feelings about Joffery to Margaery.

episodes.title: Walk of Punishment
episodes.description: Robb and Catelyn arrive at Riverrun for Lord Hoster Tully's funeral. Tywin names Tyrion the new Master of Coin. Arya says goodbye to Hot Pie. The Night's Watch returns to Craster's. Brienne and Jaime are taken prisoner.

episodes.title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
episodes.description: Jaime mopes over his lost hand. Cersei is growing uncomfortable with the Tyrells. The Night's Watch is growing impatient with Craster. Daenerys buys the Unsullied.

episodes.title: Kissed by Fire
episodes.description: Robb's army is falling apart. Jaime reveals a story to Brienne that he has never told anyone. Jon breaks his vows. The Hound is granted his freedom. The Lannisters hatch a new plan.

episodes.title: The Climb
episodes.description: Jon and the wildlings scale the Wall. The Brotherhood sells Gendry to Melisandre. Robb does what he can to win back the Freys. Tyrion tells Sansa about their engagement.

episodes.title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
episodes.description: Jon and the wildlings travel south of the Wall. Talisa tells Robb that she's pregnant. Arya runs away from the Brotherhood. Daenerys arrives at Yunkai. Jaime leaves Brienne behind at Harrenhal.

episodes.title: Second Sons
episodes.description: Daenerys tries to persuade the Second Sons to join her against Yunkai. Stannis releases Davos from the dungeons. Sam and Gilly are attacked by a White Walker. Sansa and Tyrion wed.

episodes.title: The Rains of Castamere
episodes.description: Robb and Catelyn arrive at the Twins for the wedding. Jon is put to the test to see where his loyalties truly lie. Bran's group decides to split up. Daenerys plans an invasion of Yunkai.

episodes.title: Mhysa
episodes.description: Bran and company travel beyond the Wall. Sam returns to Castle Black. Jon says goodbye to Ygritte. Jaime returns to King's Landing. The Night's Watch asks for help from Stannis.

episodes.title: Two Swords
episodes.description: Tyrion welcomes a guest to King's Landing. At Castle Black, Jon stands trial. Daenerys is pointed to Meereen, the mother of all slave cities. Arya runs into an old enemy.

episodes.title: The Lion and the Rose
episodes.description: Joffrey and Margaery's wedding has come. Tyrion breaks up with Shae. Ramsay tries to prove his worth to his father. Bran and company find a Weirwood tree.

episodes.title: Breaker of Chains
episodes.description: Tyrion is arrested for murder and awaits trial. Sansa escapes King's Landing. Sam sends Gilly to Mole's Town as the Night's Watch finds itself in a tight spot. Meereen challenges Daenerys.

episodes.title: Oathkeeper
episodes.description: Jaime entrusts a task to Brienne. Daenerys frees Meereen. Jon is given permission to lead a group of Night's Watchmen to Craster's Keep. Bran and company are taken hostage.

episodes.title: First of His Name
episodes.description: Tommen is crowned King of the Seven Kingdoms. Cersei builds her case against Tyrion. Sansa and Lord Baelish arrive at the Eyrie. The Night's Watch attacks Craster's Keep.

episodes.title: The Laws of Gods and Men
episodes.description: Tyrion's trial has come. Yara and her troops storm the Dreadfort to free Theon. Daenerys meets Hizdar zo Loraq. Stannis makes a deal with the Iron Bank of Braavos.

episodes.title: Mockingbird
episodes.description: Tyrion tries to find a champion. Daenerys sleeps with Daario. The Hound becomes wounded. Jon's advice is ignored at Castle Black. Brienne and Podrick receive a tip on Arya's whereabouts.

episodes.title: The Mountain and the Viper
episodes.description: Theon helps Ramsay seize Moat Cailin. The wildlings attack Mole's Town. Sansa comes up with a story to protect Lord Baelish. Daenerys finds out a secret about Jorah Mormont. Oberyn Martell faces Gregor Clegane, the Mountain.

episodes.title: The Watchers on the Wall
episodes.description: The battle between the Night's Watch and the wildlings has come.

episodes.title: The Children
episodes.description: Bran meets the Three-Eyed Raven. Tyrion makes a choice.

episodes.title: The Wars to Come
episodes.description: Cersei and Jaime adjust to a world without Tywin. Tyrion and Varys arrive at Pentos. In Meereen, a new enemy emerges. Jon is caught between two kings.

episodes.title: The House of Black and White
episodes.description: Arya arrives in Braavos. Jaime takes on a secret mission. Ellaria Sand seeks revenge for Oberyn's death. Stannis makes Jon a generous offer as the Night's Watch elects a new Lord Commander. Daenerys is faced with a difficult decision.

episodes.title: High Sparrow
episodes.description: Tommen and Margaery wed. Arya has trouble adapting to her new life. Littlefinger reveals his plans to Sansa. Jon gives his first orders as Lord Commander. Tyrion and Varys arrive in Volantis.

episodes.title: Sons of the Harpy
episodes.description: Jorah Mormont sets sail alongside his prisoner, Tyrion. Cersei makes a move against the Tyrells. Jaime and Bronn sneak into Dorne. Ellaria and the Sand Snakes make their plans. Melisandre tempts Jon. The Harpies attack.

episodes.title: Kill the Boy
episodes.description: Daenerys arrests the heads of Meereen's great families. Jon makes a difficult decision. Theon is forced to face Sansa. Stannis rides south. Tyrion and Jorah enter the ruins of Old Valyria.

episodes.title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
episodes.description: Arya is put to the test. Tyrion and Jorah are captured by slavers. Loras Tyrell is judged by the Sparrows. Jaime and Bronn face the Sand Snakes. Sansa marries Ramsay Bolton.

episodes.title: The Gift
episodes.description: Jon heads east as trouble begins to stir for Sam and Gilly at Castle Black. Sansa asks Theon for help. Tyrion and Jorah are sold as slaves. Cersei savors her triumph over the Tyrells as new plots are developed in the shadows.

episodes.title: Hardhome
episodes.description: Tyrion advises Daenerys. Sansa forces Theon to tell her a secret. Cersei remains stubborn. Arya meets her first target. Jon and Tormund meet with the wildling elders.

episodes.title: The Dance of Dragons
episodes.description: Jon and the wildlings return to Castle Black. Jaime meets with Doran Martell. Stannis makes a hard choice. Arya runs into Meryn Trant. Daenerys attends the grand reopening of the fighting pits.

episodes.title: Mother's Mercy
episodes.description: Stannis arrives at Winterfell. Tyrion runs Meereen as Daario and Jorah go after Daenerys. Jaime and Myrcella leave Dorne. Jon sends Sam and Gilly to Oldtown. Arya challenges the Many-Faced God. Cersei confesses her sins.

episodes.title: The Red Woman
episodes.description: The fate of Jon Snow is revealed. Daenerys is brought before Khal Moro. Tyrion gets used to living in Meereen. Ramsay sends his dogs after Theon and Sansa. Ellaria and the Sand Snakes make their move. Cersei mourns for Myrcella.

episodes.title: Home
episodes.description: Bran trains with the Three-Eyed Raven. Tommen meets with Cersei. Tyrion makes a bold move. Theon leaves while at Pyke new issues arise. Ramsay's brother is born. Davos asks Melisandre for a miracle.

episodes.title: Oathbreaker
episodes.description: Daenerys arrives at Vaes Dothrak. Sam and Gilly sail for Horn Hill. Arya trains as No One. Varys finds information on the Sons of the Harpy. Ramsay receives a gift. Tommen meets with the High Sparrow. At Castle Black, a miracle occurs.

episodes.title: Book of the Stranger
episodes.description: Sansa arrives at Castle Black. Tyrion makes a deal with the slave masters. Jorah and Daario sneak into Vaes Dothrak. Ramsay sends a letter to Jon. Theon arrives at Pyke. Cersei and Olenna Tyrell plot against the High Sparrow.

episodes.title: The Door
episodes.description: Sansa and Jon make plans. Arya is given another chance to prove herself. Jorah confesses a secret to Daenerys. Tyrion meets with a red priestess. Yara finds her rule tested. Bran discovers the origin of the White Walkers.

episodes.title: Blood of My Blood
episodes.description: Bran and Meera find a new ally. Gilly meets Sam's family. Arya makes a difficult choice. The Lannisters and Tyrells march against the High Sparrow.

episodes.title: The Broken Man
episodes.description: Jon and Sansa gather troops. Jaime arrives at Riverrun. Olenna Tyrell plans to leave King's Landing. Theon and Yara plan a destination. Arya makes plans to leave.

episodes.title: No One
episodes.description: Brienne arrives at Riverrun. Arya seeks shelter. Jaime meets with Edmure Tully. Cersei challenges the Faith. Sandor Clegane hunts for revenge. Tyrion faces the consequences of earlier decisions.

episodes.title: Battle of the Bastards
episodes.description: Jon and Sansa face Ramsay Bolton on the fields of Winterfell. Daenerys strikes back at her enemies. Theon and Yara arrive in Meereen.

episodes.title: The Winds of Winter
episodes.description: Cersei and Loras Tyrell stand trial by the gods. Daenerys prepares to set sail for Westeros. Davos confronts Melisandre. Sam and Gilly arrive in the Citadel. Bran discovers a long-kept secret. Lord Frey has an uninvited guest.

episodes.title: Dragonstone
episodes.description: Jon organizes the North's defenses. Cersei tries to even the odds. Daenerys comes home. Arya reminds the Freys "the North remembers." Sam adapts to life in Oldtown. The Night King makes his way south.

episodes.title: Stormborn
episodes.description: Daenerys receives an unexpected visitor. Jon faces resistance. Tyrion plans the conquest of Westeros. Cersei gathers her allies. Arya has a reunion with old friends. Sam risks his career and life.

episodes.title: The Queen's Justice
episodes.description: Jon and Daenerys finally meet. Cersei gains a new ally. Sansa receives an unexpected visitor. Sam is confronted for his actions.

episodes.title: The Spoils of War
episodes.description: Daenerys takes matters into her own hands. Arya reaches her destination. Jaime and Bronn collect the spoils from the war with the Tyrells.

episodes.title: Eastwatch
episodes.description: Daenerys demands loyalty from the surviving Lannister soldiers; Jon heeds Bran's warning about White Walkers on the move; Cersei vows to vanquish anyone or anything that stands in her way.

episodes.title: Beyond the Wall
episodes.description: Jon and his team go beyond the wall to capture a wight. Daenerys has to make a tough decision.

episodes.title: The Dragon and the Wolf
episodes.description: Everyone meets in King's Landing to discuss the fate of the realm. In Winterfell, Sansa confronts Arya. Sam reaches Winterfell, where he learns from Bran a shocking secret about Jon Snow.

episodes.title: Winterfell
episodes.description: Jon and Daenerys arrive in Winterfell and are met with skepticism. Sam learns about the fate of his family. Cersei gives Euron the reward he aims for. Theon follows his heart.

episodes.title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
episodes.description: Jaime faces judgment and Winterfell prepares for the battle to come.

episodes.title: The Long Night
episodes.description: The Night King and his army have arrived at Winterfell and the great battle begins.

episodes.title: The Last of the Starks
episodes.description: The Battle of Winterfell is over and a new chapter for Westeros begins.

episodes.title: The Bells
episodes.description: Forces have arrived at King's Landing for the final battle.

episodes.title: The Iron Throne
episodes.description: In the aftermath of the devastating attack on King's Landing, Daenerys must face the survivors.

series.title: American Murder: Gabby Petito
series.description: A young couple's cross-country van journey, documented on social media, ends in tragedy when domestic violence shatters their seemingly perfect life. Their story sparks a nationwide investigation and raises questions about family loyalty.

episodes.title: We Bought a Van
episodes.description: In the summer of 2021 Gabby and her fiancé Brian take a "van life" trip to the American west, but a 911 call raises alarms about their relationship.

episodes.title: Where is Gabby?
episodes.description: Days after a police stop in Utah, Gabby goes missing and parents alert the authorities, setting off a massive search for her - and for Brian.

episodes.title: Burn After Reading
episodes.description: Gabby's loved ones grapple with the shocking news of her death. As the Police close in on Brian's location in Florida, suspicions about his parents grow.

series.title: Surviving Black Hawk Down
series.description: An in-depth documentary series revisiting the infamous Battle of Mogadishu through the eyes of survivors.

episodes.title: This is Not New York
episodes.description: Somalia, 1993. An effort to end famine and civil war turns violent when a US mission to take out a rebel leader ends in the death of multiple civilians.

episodes.title: A Wall of Lead
episodes.description: A routine raid to capture two of Aidid's lieutenants turns into a chaotic rescue operation when the Army Rangers are met with fierce Somali counterfire.

episodes.title: No Way Out
episodes.description: As news of the botched Black Hawk operation rattles America, video of a captive pilot shocks the globe. Will he be rescued?

series.title: Newtopia
series.description: A soldier faces a zombie outbreak during military service. His girlfriend, an engineer, navigates zombie-ridden Seoul. Both fight through the undead-infested city, striving to reunite amid the chaos.

episodes.description: Young-joo breaks up with her boyfriend, Jae-yoon. He accepts the breakup with a heartfelt voice message. Upon hearing this, Young-joo heads to his workplace, but she encounters an unexpected incident on her way there.
Jae-yoon and In-ho find a plane crashing into the heart of Seoul. Young-joo and Jin-wook confront zombies and team up with Tae-shik. Together, they begin their fight for survival.

Jae-yoon, In-ho, Soo-jeong, and Chef Jung return to the air defense unit. However, even the base they thought was safe begins to face the threat of zombies. Young-joo decides to go alone to Tower 77 A, where Jae-yoon is located.

Jae-yoon and Young-joo reminisce about their happy past. Jae-yoon and his squad mourn the loss of their comrades. Young-joo's group encounters Tripeater, who has been bitten by a zombie but has not yet turned.
A military sergeant must guide his platoon to safety after their base becomes overrun with zombies, while another group of survivors faces danger at the facility's entrance.

Young-joo is left by herself at the Express Bus Terminal Station, but a stroke of luck leads her to a metro staff office, where she gathers supplies to battle the zombies. Meanwhile, Jae-yoon's group reaches Eden Hotel, where they run into Arron Park, who has survived there alone. But the group gets split up by an unexpected attack by the zombies, throwing them into separate hotel rooms.

On her way to Suseo Station, Young-joo meets a special person who helps her. She relentlessly fights the zombies alone on her way to her boyfriend. Meanwhile, Jae-yoon and the squad reach the 35th floor through the ducts.
Jae-yoon escapes the A Tower first and saves others with a brilliant idea. But they must endure another goodbye. In the meantime, Young-joo runs into people who are even more brutal than zombies.

series.title: Cassandra
series.description: Germany's oldest smart home awakens its AI helper Cassandra after decades when a new family moves in. Cassandra, determined never to be abandoned again, manipulates events using the home's resources to become part of the family.

episodes.title: Ein neuer Anfang
episodes.description: Samira moves her family into a 1970s smart home. Her curiosity turns into suspicion when her son reactivates the house's long-dormant Al assistant.

episodes.title: Wer bin ich?
episodes.description: Cassandra begins to turn Samira's family against her. Fynn takes an interest in a classmate. In 1971, a woman suspects her husband of infidelity.

episodes.title: Endspiel
episodes.description: Feeling isolated, Samira tries to convince David of Cassandra's intentions. In 1971, a mother goes to extreme lengths to protect her son

episodes.title: Ein Kinderspiel
episodes.description: Fynn goes looking for Steve. Tensions reach a boiling point during Juno's playdate. In 1964, a medical experiment takes a terrible turn.

episodes.title: Du bist nicht allein
episodes.description: With Samira out of the house, Cassandra takes her family hostage. In 1972, Cassandra adapts to her new living circumstances.

episodes.title: Frohe Weihnachten
episodes.description: Convinced that her family is in danger, Samira attempts to return home. Meanwhile, Cassandra asserts full control over the house.

series.title: The Åre Murders
series.description: A Stockholm detective under internal investigation heads to a ski resort to unwind, until a young girl's disappearance compels her back to work.

episodes.title: Offermakaren: Del 1
episodes.description: Stockholm police officer Hanna arrives in Åre but soon joins the search effort for a girl who went missing on her way home from a party.

episodes.title: Offermakaren: Del 2
episodes.description: Daniel discovers Hanna's secret, while her cleaner Zuhra is concealing something of her own. Annika and Bosse throw a mulled-wine night.

episodes.title: Offermakaren: Del 3
episodes.description: Hanna gets important information from Ebba. Amanda's father is sure he knows what happened. A clue from Zuhra brings everything to a head.

episodes.title: Hidden in Shadows: Part 1
episodes.description: A couple of months after solving Amanda's case, a new crime shocks Åre just as Daniel prepares to go on parental leave

episodes.title: Hidden in Shadows: Part 2
episodes.description: The police search for Rebecka and look to solve Johan's murder. Hanna and Daniel receive surprising news that leads them in a new direction.

series.title: Apple Cider Vinegar
series.description: The life of wellness guru Belle Gibson, who had a large social media following, where she pretended to be suffering from cancer but keeping the disease under control using self-care therapies. She confessed that none of it was true.

episodes.title: Toxic
episodes.description: A rare and unexpected diagnosis puts Milla's carefree life on hold. Belle's anxieties begin to spiral when her baby shower doesn't go as planned.

episodes.title: Clean Sheets
episodes.description: Milla takes her treatment into her own hands. Belle turns to Clive, a shy IT expert, for comfort. An enamored Belle meets Milla for the first time.

episodes.title: Pink Dolphins
episodes.description: In the wake of devastating news, Clive struggles to cope while Belle dives into work. Lucy's frustration grows as Justin digs into Belle's past.

episodes.title: Mama Aya
episodes.description: Lucy seeks new experiences on a mind-bending trip to Peru. Chanelle joins Belle as her popularity soars, and Milla's world begins to unravel.

episodes.title: Casseroles
episodes.description: As scrutiny mounts, Belle faces tough questions about her health. Milla turns to family for help while Justin finds a new angle for his article.

episodes.title: Tapeworm
episodes.description: At a funeral, Belle scrambles to stick to her story, but the article yields surprising reactions. Can her wellness empire survive a web of lies?

series.title: Common Side Effects
series.description: Follows former high school lab mates Marshall and Frances as they unravel a conspiracy involving big pharma and the government to suppress knowledge of a rare fungus secret that may contain the solution to cure all world's diseases.

episodes.title: The Pill
episodes.description: High school lab partners Marshall and Frances uncover a conspiracy by big pharma and the government to suppress a rare mushroom that could cure all diseases.

episodes.title: Lakeshore Limited
episodes.description: Marshall is on the run, trying to flee New York; Frances confides to her boss, Rick, about the mushroom; Rick sends her to Marshall's farm to get more, but the situation gets out of hand.

episodes.title: Hildy
episodes.description: Marshall seeks advice from his old mentor, Hildy. Copano and Harrington are drawn further into the mystery of the mushrooms obtained at the raid.

episodes.title: Dumpsite
episodes.description: Marshall buys a plot of land near a chemical waste site with a plan to grow more mushrooms; Frances rushes home from Europe after a huge development; Copano and Harrington investigate a connection between Marshall and Frances.

episodes.title: Star-Tel-Lite
episodes.description: Marshall, Frances, and their crazy neighbors deal with the aftermath of a dangerous incident.

episodes.title: In the System
episodes.description: Marshall arrives in jail and learns that some very important people refuse to let him out, while danger lurks around every corner; Frances makes a fateful decision; Copano and Harrington pick up the pieces.

episodes.title: Blowfish
episodes.description: Marshall is rescued by another inmate, but now Marshall owes him a favor; desperate to get out of prison, he works on a risky plan when he runs into a surprising ally; Frances grapples with a life-changing event.

episodes.title: Amelia & Wyatt
episodes.description: After being declared dead, Marshall Cuso and Amelia must resolve unfinished business by staying hidden. Francis deals with his supposed loss while facing unexpected changes in the development of Reutical mushrooms.

episodes.title: Cliff's Edge
episodes.description: Marshall discovers what Hildy has been up to, but obstacles remain. Copano and Harrington zero in on Marshall's location .

episodes.title: Raid
episodes.description: The FBI/DEA raid the compound, resulting in awful consequences. The fate of the mushroom is decided.

series.title: Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man
series.description: An animated series following Peter Parker's early days as Spider-Man, balancing high school life with superhero responsibilities.

episodes.title: Amazing Fantasy
episodes.description: During high school orientation, Peter's life is forever changed. A new era of Spider-Man begins here.

episodes.title: The Parker Luck
episodes.description: Peter begins an exclusive internship, but his first day is way more complicated than he expected.

episodes.title: Secret Identity Crisis
episodes.description: Peter deals with the fallout of his secret revealed. Meanwhile, Lonnie's perfect life falls apart.

episodes.title: Hitting the Big Time
episodes.description: Peter and Norman work through creative differences, while Lonnie undergoes a loyalty test.

episodes.title: The Unicorn Unleashed!
episodes.description: Peter makes a new friend. Meanwhile, Lonnie finds himself in the sights of a dangerous gang.

episodes.title: Duel with the Devil
episodes.description: Peter's night off is derailed when he must suit up to stop a mysterious intruder.

episodes.title: Scorpion Rising
episodes.description: Peter and Lonnie face the consequences of their secret lives. Spider-Man faces his biggest threat.

episodes.title: Tangled Web
episodes.description: Norman gives Spider-Man an ultimatum, causing Peter to do some soul-searching.

episodes.title: Hero or Menace
episodes.description: Spider-Man swings into action, as Lonnie looks to settle a score and Norman visits an old friend.

episodes.title: If This Be My Destiny...
episodes.description: Peter's internship takes a dark turn with the arrival of an unexpected visitor.

series.title: Paradise
series.description: A Secret Service agent investigates the murder of a former president in a seemingly peaceful community.

episodes.title: Wildcat Is Down
episodes.description: It's just another day in Paradise until Xavier Collins discovers one of the world's most powerful individuals has been viciously murdered. Xavier analyzes the crime scene while recalling his complex relationship with the victim.

episodes.title: Sinatra
episodes.description: Agent Xavier Collins is interrogated. Samantha Redmond (codenamed Sinatra) begins to reassure the community as she reflects on how she got to Paradise.

episodes.title: The Architect of Social Well-Being
episodes.description: Isolated, Xavier seeks answers on his own and cautiously turns to Dr. Gabriela Torabi. Meanwhile, Billy and Jane feel the pressure from Robinson's investigation.

episodes.title: Agent Billy Pace
episodes.description: The citizens of Paradise celebrate at the annual carnival. Xavier and Billy delve deeper into their investigation.

episodes.title: In the Palaces of Crowned Kings
episodes.description: Xavier faces the consequences of his investigation, forcing him to consider how to proceed. Meanwhile, Cal's family history and his last days are examined.

episodes.title: You Asked for Miracles
episodes.description: Xavier and Robinson execute their plans as Sinatra strives to maintain Paradise's current state.

episodes.title: The Day
episodes.description: Sinatra and Xavier confront the past, returning to the harrowing day that brought them to Paradise.

episodes.title: The Man Who Kept the Secrets
episodes.description: Xavier and Robinson race to find President Bradford's murderer before it's too late.

series.title: One Piece
series.description: In a seafaring world, a young pirate captain sets out with his crew to attain the title of Pirate King, and to discover the mythical treasure known as 'One Piece.'
series.country: United Kingdom, United States, South Africa, Japan

episodes.title: Romance Dawn
episodes.description: A boy named Monkey D. Luffy embarks on a journey to attain the greatest treasure: the one piece. After the former pirate king's public execution 22 years ago, the world has entered a great pirate era, and Luffy aims to be at the top.

episodes.title: The Man in the Straw Hat
episodes.description: Luffy, Zoro, and Nami find themselves imprisoned on an island overtaken by the deranged clown pirate, Buggy. Koby joins the Marines and proves his mettle.

episodes.title: Tell No Tales
episodes.description: Luffy, Zoro, and Nami meet Usopp in the Syrup Village a small, peaceful village. Usopp tells all sorts of lies about his adventures he has never been to his friend, Kaya, who has been sick in bed for over a year since she lost her parents.

episodes.title: The Pirates Are Coming
episodes.description: Luffy, Zoro, and Nami fight their way through Kaya's mansion, which has now become a prison. Usopp enlists the help of Koby, Helmeppo, and the Marines. Luffy finally gets the ship of his dreams as Garp closes in.

episodes.title: Eat at Baratie!
episodes.description: Luffy and the gang are tested in their ability to fight together on the high seas. They arrive at Baratie, a floating restaurant, where they encounter Sanji, a young chef with a love of fine dining. A duel on the docks shocks the group.

episodes.title: The Chef and the Chore Boy
episodes.description: Sanji's past is revealed as a new threat emerges.

episodes.title: The Girl with the Sawfish Tattoo
episodes.description: Garp is one step away from finding Luffy as he arrives at Baratie. Luffy and the boys all travel to Coco Village; in an attempt to find the estranged and distraught Nami, they meet a villager that has a dark and painful history with her.

episodes.title: Worst in the East
episodes.description: Luffy and the others charge towards Arlong Park after a broken Nami utters the words "Help me." Luffy encounters Arlong meanwhile the gang fend off against Arlong's crew as a cheeky Buggy makes his escape. A new pirate crew is born.

series.title: Squid Game
series.description: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange invitation to compete in children's games. A tempting prize awaits, but with deadly high stakes.

episodes.title: Mugunghwa kkochi pideon nal
episodes.description: Hoping to win easy money, a broke and desperate Gi-hun agrees to take part in an enigmatic game. Not long into the first round, unforeseen horrors unfold.

episodes.title: Jiok
episodes.description: Split on whether to continue or quit, the group holds a vote. But their realities in the outside world may prove to be just as unforgiving as the game.

episodes.title: Usan-eul sseun namja
episodes.description: A few players enter the next round - which promises equal doses of sweet and deadly - with hidden advantages. Meanwhile, Jun-ho sneaks his way inside.

episodes.title: Jollyeodo pyeonmeokgi
episodes.description: As alliances form among the players, no one is safe in the dorm after lights-out. The third game challenges Gi-hun's team to think strategically.

episodes.title: Pyeongdeung-han sesang
episodes.description: Gi-hun and his team take turns keeping guard through the night. The masked men encounter trouble with their co-conspirators.

episodes.title: Kkanbu
episodes.description: Players pair off for the fourth game. Gi-hun grapples with a moral dilemma, Sang-woo chooses self-preservation and Sae-byeok shares her untold story.

episodes.title: VIPS
episodes.description: The Masked Leader welcomes VIP guests to the facility for a front-row viewing of the show. In the fifth game, some players crack under pressure.

episodes.title: Peuronteumaen
episodes.description: Ahead of the last round, distrust and disgust run deep among the finalists. Jun-ho makes a getaway, determined to expose the game's dirty secrets.

episodes.title: Unsu joeun nal
episodes.description: The final round presents another cruel test but this time, how it ends depends on just one player. The game's creator steps out of the shadows.

episodes.title: Ppang-gwa bokgwon
episodes.description: A vengeful Gi-hun makes a U-turn at the airport. Later, in his hideout, he intensifies his search for the elusive recruiter who is seeking new players.

episodes.title: Hallowin pati
episodes.description: Gi-hun finally gets hold of an invitation, marked for Halloween day. In a tense moment facing Jun-ho, they reveal their truths to each other.
New players gather for a chance to win 45.6 billion won. After an intense first round, the survivors' fates hang in the balance - down to one final vote.

episodes.title: Yeoseot gaeui dari
episodes.description: The players prepare for the next game: a six-legged pentathlon, where each team member must clear a mini-game to survive -- or face collective elimination.

episodes.title: Han pan deo
episodes.description: Kang No-eul earns enemies for her unruly actions. Nerves fray to the breaking point as the remaining players vote on whether to move to the next round.

episodes.title: O X
episodes.description: Jun-ho and his team prepare to infiltrate a suspicious island. As monetary stakes and tensions rise, players split into two opposing factions.

episodes.title: Chinguwa jeok
episodes.description: The remaining players strategize on how to survive the night. Gi-hun proposes a risky plan--but he will need trustworthy allies to carry it out.

episodes.title: Yeolsoewa kal
episodes.description: No-eul infiltrates a dangerous operation with a risky plan. A new game is announced: hide-and-seek, where one group holds a key and the other a knife.

episodes.title: Byeol-i bichnaneun bam
episodes.description: The games resume, and Gi-hun fixates on confronting Kang Dae-ho. Meanwhile, Kim Jun-hee faces a sudden crisis that pushes her willpower to its limits.

episodes.title: Dangsin-ui tas-i anida
episodes.description: Jun-ho's team gets close to finding the island. Jang Geum-ja makes a desperate plea to Gi-hun to help Jun-hee. The VIPs discuss a cruel proposal.
Even as Gi-hun supports Jun-hee amid rising tensions, she must make a pivotal decision. Before the final game, the Front Man gives Gi-hun an ultimatum.

episodes.title: o/_|_|
episodes.description: No-eul tries to gain the upper hand in negotiations, but her plans backfire. Gi-hun faces a moral crossroads, testing his limits - how far will he go?

episodes.title: Saram-eun...
episodes.description: As Jun-ho races to reach the island, tensions peak in the final round. The last players face an impossible situation in the closing minutes of the game.

series.title: Stranger Things
series.description: In 1980s Indiana, a group of young friends witness supernatural forces and secret government exploits. As they search for answers, the children unravel a series of extraordinary mysteries.

episodes.title: Chapter One: The Vanishing of Will Byers
episodes.description: On his way home from a friend's house, young Will sees something terrifying. Nearby, a sinister secret lurks in the depths of a government lab

episodes.title: Chapter Two: The Weirdo on Maple Street
episodes.description: Lucas, Mike and Dustin try to talk to the girl they found in the woods. Meanwhile, Hopper questions an anxious Joyce about an unsettling phone call.

episodes.title: Chapter Three: Holly, Jolly
episodes.description: An increasingly concerned Nancy looks for Barb and finds out what Jonathan's been up to. Joyce is convinced Will is trying to talk to her.

episodes.title: Chapter Four: The Body
episodes.description: Refusing to believe Will is dead, Joyce tries to connect with her son. The boys give Eleven a makeover. Jonathan and Nancy form an unlikely alliance.

episodes.title: Chapter Five: The Flea and the Acrobat
episodes.description: Hopper breaks into the lab to find the truth about Will's death. The boys try to locate the "gate" that will take them to Will.

episodes.title: Chapter Six: The Monster
episodes.description: A frantic Jonathan looks for Nancy in the darkness, but Steve's looking for her, too. Hopper and Joyce uncover the truth about the lab's experiments.

episodes.title: Chapter Seven: The Bathtub
episodes.description: The government comes searching for Eleven. Eleven looks for Will and Barb in the Upside Down.

episodes.title: Chapter Eight: The Upside Down
episodes.description: Joyce and Hopper are taken in for questioning. Nancy and Jonathan prepare to fight the monster and save Will.

episodes.title: Chapter One: MADMAX
episodes.description: As the town preps for Halloween, a high-scoring rival shakes things up at the arcade, and a skeptical Hopper inspects a field of rotting pumpkins.

episodes.title: Chapter Two: Trick or Treat, Freak
episodes.description: After Will sees something terrible on trick-or-treat night, Mike wonders whether Eleven's still out there. Nancy wrestles with the truth about Barb.

episodes.title: Chapter Three: The Pollywog
episodes.description: Dustin adopts a strange new pet, and Eleven grows increasingly impatient. A well-meaning Bob urges Will to stand up to his fears.

episodes.title: Chapter Four: Will the Wise
episodes.description: Will's visiAn ailing Will opens up to Joyce -- with disturbing results. While Hopper digs for the truth, Eleven unearths a surprising discovery.ons intensify.

episodes.title: Chapter Five: Dig Dug
episodes.description: Nancy and Jonathan swap conspiracy theories with a new ally as Eleven searches for someone from her past. "Bob the Brain" tackles a difficult problem.

episodes.title: Chapter Six: The Spy
episodes.description: Will's connection to a shadowy evil grows stronger but no one's quite sure how to stop it. Elsewhere, Dustin and Steve forge an unlikely bond.

episodes.title: Chapter Seven: The Lost Sister
episodes.description: Psychic visions draw Eleven to a band of violent outcasts and an angry girl with a shadowy past.

episodes.title: Chapter Eight: The Mind Flayer
episodes.description: An unlikely hero steps forward when a deadly development puts the Hawkins lab on lockdown, trapping Will and several others inside.

episodes.title: Chapter Nine: The Gate
episodes.description: Eleven makes plans to finish what she started while the survivors turn up the heat on the monstrous force that's holding Will hostage.

episodes.title: Chapter One: Suzie, Do You Copy?
episodes.description: Summer brings new jobs and budding romance. But the mood shifts when Dustin's radio picks up a Russian broadcast, and Will senses something is wrong.

episodes.title: Chapter Two: The Mall Rats
episodes.description: Nancy and Jonathan follow a lead, Steve and Robin sign on to a secret mission, and Max and Eleven go shopping. A rattled Billy has troubling visions.

episodes.title: Chapter Three: The Case of the Missing Lifeguard
episodes.description: With El and Max looking for Billy, Will declares a day without girls. Steve and Dustin go on a stakeout, and Joyce and Hopper return to Hawkins Lab.

episodes.title: Chapter Four: The Sauna Test
episodes.description: A code red brings the gang back together to face a frighteningly familiar evil. Karen urges Nancy to keep digging, and Robin finds a useful map.

episodes.title: Chapter Five: The Flayed
episodes.description: Strange surprises lurk inside an old farmhouse and deep beneath the Starcourt Mall. Meanwhile, the Mind Flayer is gathering strength.

episodes.title: Chapter Six: E Pluribus Unum
episodes.description: Dr. Alexei reveals what the Russians have been building, and Eleven sees where Billy has been. Dustin and Erica stage a daring rescue.

episodes.title: Chapter Seven: The Bite
episodes.description: With time running out - and an assassin close behind - Hopper's crew races back to Hawkins, where El and the kids are preparing for war.

episodes.title: Chapter Eight: The Battle of Starcourt
episodes.description: Terror reigns in the food court when the Mind Flayer comes to collect. But down below, in the dark, the future of the world is at stake.

episodes.title: Chapter One: The Hellfire Club
episodes.description: Still reeling from the events last year, the gang tries to move on with their lives. However, a threat is brewing both on Earth and the Upside Down.

episodes.title: Chapter Two: Vecna's Curse
episodes.description: A plane brings Mike to California -- and a dead body brings Hawkins to a halt. Nancy goes looking for leads. A shaken Eddie tells the gang what he saw.

episodes.title: Chapter Three: The Monster and the Superhero
episodes.description: Murray and Joyce fly to Alaska, and El faces serious consequences. Robin and Nancy dig up dirt on Hawkins' demons. Dr. Owens delivers sobering news.

episodes.title: Chapter Four: Dear Billy
episodes.description: Max is in grave danger - and running out of time. A patient at Pennhurst Asylum has visitors. Elsewhere, in Russia, Hopper is hard at work.

episodes.title: Chapter Five: The Nina Project
episodes.description: Owens takes El to Nevada, where she's forced to confront her past, while the Hawkins kids comb a crumbling house for clues. Vecna claims another victim.

episodes.title: Chapter Six: The Dive
episodes.description: Behind the Iron Curtain, a risky rescue mission gets underway. The California crew seeks help from a hacker. Steve takes one for the team.

episodes.title: Chapter Seven: The Massacre at Hawkins Lab
episodes.description: As Hopper braces to battle a monster, Dustin dissects Vecna's motives -- and decodes a message from beyond. El finds strength in a distant memory.

episodes.title: Chapter Eight: Papa
episodes.description: Nancy has sobering visions, and El passes an important test. Back in Hawkins, the gang gathers supplies and prepares for battle.

episodes.title: Chapter Nine: The Piggyback
episodes.description: With selfless hearts and a clash of metal, heroes fight from every corner of the battlefield to save Hawkins - and the world itself.

series.title: Gachiakuta
series.genre: Action, Adventure, Animation, Anime, Drama, Fantasy, Shonen, Survival, Dark Fantasy, Hand-Drawn Animtion
series.description: In a floating city, a young boy is framed for the death of his father and exiled. He ends up in a junkyard zone, and swears to return for revenge.

episodes.title: Tenkai
episodes.description: Bullied outcast Rudo finds respite in repurposing trash, until a terrible tragedy changes his life forever.

episodes.title: Yadori-mono
episodes.description: Cast into the Pit, Rudo is saved by the mysterious Enjin who may not have his best interests at heart.

episodes.title: Gekai
episodes.description: After awakening as a Giver, Rudo is chased by Trash Beasts and saved by Enjin who recruits him into the Cleaners At a burger joint Enjin explains Trash Beasts and Vital Instruments. Rudo meets his mentor Zanka.

episodes.title: Soujiya Honbu
episodes.description: After being introduced to Cleaner HQ, Rudo follows Riyo on a job to learn the business.

episodes.title: Arashi-ya
episodes.description: The Cleaners go on a job to save another Sphereite who survived the fall. Rudo tags along to learn more.

episodes.title: Chanto Shita Ichigeki!!
episodes.description: With the job having gone terribly wrong, Rudo finds himself face to face with a merciless Raider named Jabber.

episodes.title: Ketcchaku
episodes.description: Jabber employs a new strategy to get through Rudo's defenses, and another ally joins the fray.

episodes.title: Zenshin
episodes.description: Rudo deals with the emotional aftermath of the Jabber fight and gets a new lead about returning to the Sphere.

episodes.title: Rakugaki no Machi
episodes.description: To get a "spell" for their next mission, the Cleaners head to Canvas Town, where they make a tragic discovery.

episodes.title: Sabaku no Kiniki "Penta"
episodes.description: Remlin casts a protective spell on the Keepers before they journey into the desert to find a mysterious woman.

episodes.title: Amo no Motenashi
episodes.description: A mysterious woman living in the No Man's Land challenges the crew from an unexpected angle.

episodes.title: Noroi no You na Mono Kashira
episodes.description: Tamsy and Zanka fight to save their captive allies. In the aftermath, Rudo has an unexpected reaction.

series.title: Dandadan
series.description: When Momo and Okarun's beliefs clash, they're thrown into a world of ghosts, aliens and awakened powers.

episodes.title: Sorette koi no hajimari jan yo
episodes.description: Momo believes in ghosts, but not aliens. Okarun believes in aliens, but not ghosts. In their quests to prove each other wrong, they learn the shocking truth that both aliens and ghosts really exist and are out to get them.

episodes.title: Sorette uchûjin ja ne
episodes.description: Okarun is cursed by Turbo Granny, and Momo uses her newly found psychic powers to curb Turbo Granny from running out of control. Dawn breaks, and the two of them temporarily find shelter in Momo's house.

episodes.title: Babâ to babâ ga gekitotsu jan ka
episodes.description: Okarun transforms from Turbo Granny's curse. He goes berserk unable to control his power, but Momo's grandmother Seiko, saves them in the nick of time. To lift the curse, Momo and Okarun decide to play tag with Turbo Granny.

episodes.title: Tâbo Babâ o buttobasô
episodes.description: To settle the score with Turbo Granny, Momo and Okarun show up at the promised tunnel. They start the game of tag to pull the location-bound spirit away, and they managed to capture Turbo Granny using Momo's psychic

episodes.title: Tama wa doko jan yo
episodes.description: Victorious against Turbo Granny, Momo and Okarun regain peace. They have gotten closer through the traumatic experience, but they find their relationship to be awkward. That is when Okarun discloses something important to Momo.

episodes.title: Yabê onna ga kita
episodes.description: Momo, Okarun and Turbo Granny search for the missing golden ball. They search all over the school and find out that a girl named Aira is in possession of a ball. Perhaps the effects of the ball, but Aira can now see invisible things

episodes.title: Yasashii sekai e
episodes.description: Momo and Okarun manage to weaken Acrobatic Silky, but make a shocking discovery regarding Aira. Acrobatic Silky suggests a surprising way to help.

episodes.title: Nanka moyamoya suru jan yo
episodes.description: The battle against Acrobatic Silky is over, Aira's romantic feelings stem from how Okarun saved her. As Momo, Okarun, and Aira's feelings intertwine, Serpoians make another appearance, and the three of them are trapped in void

episodes.title: Gattai! Serupo Dôbâ Dêmon Nesshî!
episodes.description: Aira has awakened the powers of Acrobatic Silky within her and proceeds to have a seesaw battle against the Serpoians and the Dover Demon. Momo and Okarun join the fray, intensifying the battle.

episodes.title: Kyatoru myûtirêshon o kimi wa mita ka
episodes.description: Momo, Okarun, and Aira make it through the alien assault by combining their powers. However, the Dover Demon that they thought they had defeated

episodes.title: Hatsukoi no hito
episodes.description: Momo's childhood friend, Jiji, appears and begins living in Momo's house. Jiji has been worrying about apparitions in the house he moved into. Okarun is clearly disturbed hearing that Jiji is Momo's first love.

episodes.title: Noroi no ie e rettsu gô
episodes.description: Momo and Okarun head to Jiji's house in a hot springs district to investigate the case of Jiji's family. Okarun feels gloomy looking at how close Momo and Jiji are.

episodes.title: Orochi densetsu tte korejan yo
episodes.description: As Momo fends off an attack in the outdoor hot spring, Okarun and Jiji panic over how to handle the mysterious room. Just then, the doorbell rings.

episodes.title: Jashi
episodes.description: Jiji tries to stop Momo and Okarun, who are being controlled by telepathic waves, from committing suicide.

episodes.title: Yurusanê ze
episodes.description: Jiji's possessed by the Evil Eye. Okarun battles him while dodging Death Worm poison attacks underground. Unable to abandon Jiji, he tells Momo to escape alone. Above ground, Momo plans to use sunlight against the Death Worm.

episodes.title: Yabasugi jan yo
episodes.description: Momo surfaces the Mongolian Death Worm, triggering a volcano. She uses the worm as a fire hose against the lava, but the Kito family interferes. Evil Eye-possessed Jiji appears, worsening the situation.

episodes.title: Minna de otomari jan yo
episodes.description: Momo rescues Okarun and they make it home safely, while Jiji remains under Evil Eye's possession.

episodes.title: Kazoku ni narimashita
episodes.description: Jiji's Evil Eye possession grows stronger. The group attempts exorcism through Hayashi music. When they nearly succeed in forcing Evil Eye out, Jiji begs them to spare Evil Eye's life.

episodes.title: Nanka moyamoya suru jan yo
episodes.description: While Seiko trains Jiji to control the Evil Eye, it loses control and attacks Momo. She manages to get through the situation, and Okarun sets out to become stronger in order to defeat the Evil Eye.

episodes.title: Ganbare Okarun
episodes.description: Okarun and Aira end up fighting against classical composers. Aira gradually gets the hang of it, but Okarun is unable to dodge the composers' flying musical note bomb attacks. Turbo Granny gives Okarun some advice.

episodes.title: Ie o tatenaoshitai
episodes.description: The battle between Okarun and Evil Eye-fied Jiji has begun. Showing the results of his training, Okarun fights toe-to-toe against Evil Eye, going "full throttle.".

episodes.title: Moteru hiketsu wa nanda
episodes.description: In a flashback, Kinta recalls observing Okarun around school, during which he sees Okarun and Momo's accidental kiss. In the present, Kinta approaches Okarun to ask how he managed to befriend Momo and Aira despite his appearance.

episodes.title: Kaijû jan yo
episodes.description: Kinta's quick thinking let's Momo and Okarun defeat the invisible "something" that has a golden ball. Its optical camouflage wears off, and out comes a space kaiju. The trio is then attacked by the now-gigantic space kaiju.

episodes.title: Clash! Space Kaiju vs. Giant Robot!
episodes.description: Using nanoskin from Momo's house, they build a Buddha robot piloted by Kinta. With Momo's psychic powers and Aira's hair abilities, they fight the space kaiju. Okarun and Jiji get ejected and land in a rice paddy.

series.title: Sakamoto Days
series.description: Once the world's most feared hitman, Taro Sakamoto falls in love with Store Clerk Aoi. Leaving his violent past, he retires to live a peaceful life. But old enemies threaten to pull him back into the life he thought he'd left for good.

episodes.title: The Legendary Hit Man
episodes.description: Sakamoto enjoys a quiet life in retirement with his family. But one day, an old colleague demands he return to the assassin world -- or face consequences.

episodes.title: Vs. Son Hee and Bacho
episodes.description: While out on an errand, Sakamoto and Shin encounter Lu Shaotang, the daughter of a mafia boss, who's on the run and targeted by twin assassins.

episodes.title: Welcome to Sugar Park
episodes.description: Sakamoto's ex-colleague arrives with news of a one-billion-yen bounty on Sakamoto's head. For safety, Sakamoto takes his family to Sugar Park, where he must fend off assassination attempts while pretending to enjoy a fun day out..

episodes.title: Hard-Boiled
episodes.description: With the poison-wielding hitman taken out, the Sakamotos head to their next attraction, where they're ambushed by Dondenkai Ltd's ultimate assassin duo.

episodes.title: Source of Strength
episodes.description: Sakamoto goes all out in a fierce one-on-one duel with Boiled. Meanwhile, ORDER members are tasked with handling a serial case targeting assassins.

episodes.title: Heisuke Mashimo
episodes.description: A poverty stricken sniper, Heisuke Mashimo, hunts down Sakamoto for reputation and the reward bounty. However, not recognising Sakamoto's new form, he ends up joining a paintball competition with Sakamoto and Shin instead.

episodes.title: Jurassic Bastard
episodes.description: A mysterious group, from 'The Lab', kidnap Lu mistaking her for Shin.

episodes.title: Sakamoto's vs. the Lab
episodes.description: The battle at the Lab reaches new heights as Sakamoto and Shin fight to regain control of their bodies from the mad scientist's control.

episodes.title: All Aboard
episodes.description: The battle between Taro Sakamoto and Kashima continues, as the legendary hit-man had the obvious upper hand. On the other hand, Shin continued his battle against Seba as Heisuke joined the battle, giving the them an upper hand.

episodes.title: Bathhouse Roughhouse
episodes.description: Exhausted from their battle, the crew heads to a local bathhouse but finds it too dangerous to relax. Later, a mysterious man arrives in search of Lu.

episodes.title: Casino Battle
episodes.description: The crew faces Wutang in a high-stakes casino showdown to learn who issued Sakamoto's bounty. Meanwhile, X sends a group of vicious assassins their way.

episodes.title: Overload
episodes.description: Revolves around Shin and Lu encountering Saw, a serial killer who seeks to give people exciting deaths. Meanwhile, The Order plans to eliminate the escaped death row inmates targeting Sakamoto.

episodes.title: Just Desserts
episodes.description: Shin's evolving mind-reading helps him and Lu battle Saw. Lu's "Mafia Drunk" mode finishes Saw, who then gets killed by Hyo. Osaragi brutally defeats Dump. ending with Aoi seemingly in danger due to Slur's schemes.

episodes.title: Strong Assault
episodes.description: The battles rage on even as the crew gets treated by Granny Miya. Minimalist threatens Aoi at the store while Heisuke clashes with Apart at Tokyo Tower.

episodes.title: Round and Round the Tower
episodes.description: As Apart reveals his past-unable to form human connections and seeking meaning through killing- Meanwhile, X is moving with a hidden agenda that could shake the assassin world to its core..

episodes.title: Slice Slice Dance
episodes.description: Sakamoto discovers the supposed threat from the death row inmates is just a distraction designed to lure the assassin group ORDER into a trap. The real objective of the antagonist X (Slur) is to destroy the Japan Assassin Association (JAA)

episodes.title: Have a Nice Flight
episodes.description: Sakamoto decides to infiltrate his alma mater to get more intel on X. But first, he must conquer the sky-high requirements of the JCC entrance exam.

episodes.title: Kanaguri
episodes.description: It's every assassin for themselves as the exam takes to the skies. While Sakamoto impresses fellow candidate Akira, Shin takes on the germaphobe Mafuyu.

episodes.title: Exam, Stage Three
episodes.description: Stage Three of the JCC exams begins as a trio of special applicants joins the fray. Toramaru, a devoted Sakamoto fan, immediately clashes with Shin.

episodes.title: Mutual Fans
episodes.description: Sakamoto discovers Akira's ties to an old friend. While Shin and Toramaru vie over their favorite assassin, X's secret plans throw the exam into chaos.

episodes.title: Hard Mode
episodes.description: Shin teams up with Mafuyu, Toramaru and Kaji to take down a berserk Shinaya. Can these ragtag new allies work together to defeat their rampaging foe?

episodes.title: Each One's Mission
episodes.description: With the entrance exam behind them, Sakamoto and Shin can now continue with their original objective: infiltrating the JCC and obtaining clues on X.

series.title: The Fragrant Flower Blooms with Dignity
series.description: An elite girls' school resides next to a boys' school for delinquents. One day, two students from each school, Kaoruko and Rintaro, meet and develop a connection.

episodes.title: Rintaro and Kaoruko
episodes.description: While helping at his family's patisserie, Rintaro meets Kaoruko. He fears his appearance has scared her off - but she returns the next day to see him.

episodes.title: Chidori and Kikyo
episodes.description: Tensions between the two schools escalate during a commotion at Chidori's gates. Later, Rintaro finds a surprise visitor waiting at the patisserie.

episodes.title: Yasashii Hito
episodes.description: Desperate to improve their grades, Rintaro and Shohei cram in the library. There, Rintaro runs into Kaoruko, but their tender moment gets interrupted.

episodes.title: Kokoro no Ondo
episodes.description: Though Rintaro becomes more comfortable with Kaoruko during their study session, he faces unexpectedly strong opposition to their growing bond.

episodes.title: Premonition of a New Beginning
episodes.description: While celebrating passing the mid-term exams, Shohei, Ayato and Saku nearly discover Rintaro's secret. Will he finally tell them the truth ?

episodes.title: Self-Loathing / I Love You!
episodes.description: It's an important night of confessions, apologies and cherished memories when Subaru and Kaoruko catch up at the park where they used to play as kids.

episodes.title: Kakkoii Otoko
episodes.description: Noticing Rintaro's strange behavior, Shohei, Saku and Ayato follow him after school and try to eavesdrop on his meeting with Kaoruko and Subaru.

episodes.title: Kanjou no Shoutai
episodes.description: Despite the awkwardness, Rintaro manages to introduce his friends to the girls. Later, Kaoruko makes a bold suggestion on how Rintaro could repay her.

episodes.title: Kinpatsu to Piasu
episodes.description: While Rintaro struggles with his tangled emotions about Kaoruko, he invites his friends over to his home - but two unexpected visitors shake things up.

episodes.title: Aoi Arashi
episodes.description: To prepare for their finals, the six Chidori and Kikyo students hold a joint study session. Later, Shohei makes a sharp observation about Rintaro.

episodes.title: Nukumori no Hitokuchi
episodes.description: Kaoruko's birthday is in two weeks, and Rintaro is unsure of a gift until his mother gives valuable advice. Can he bake the perfect cake for her?

episodes.title: Umibe no Madoi
episodes.description: While everyone else is having fun at the beach, Subaru seems down. When prodded, she reveals her worries and makes a request to the four Chidori boys.

episodes.title: Kaoruko to Rintaro
episodes.description: With things still left unspoken between them, Rintaro arranges to meet Kaoruko and express his true feelings. Kaoruko has her own thoughts to share.

series.title: From
series.description: Unravel the mystery of a city in middle U.S.A. that imprisons everyone who enters. As the residents struggle to maintain a sense of normality and seek a way out, they must also survive the threats of the surrounding forest.

episodes.title: Long Day's Journey Into Night
episodes.description: The Matthews' family road trip takes a horrifying turn when they are detoured to a small town from which they cannot leave. When their family RV crashes, Sheriff Boyd Stevens and other residents rush to save them before the sun goes down.

episodes.title: The Way Things Are Now
episodes.description: At Colony House, Tabitha and Julie grapple with their new nightmarish reality. Out in the forest, Jim, Boyd and Kristi struggle to treat Ethan’s injuries. Tragedy strikes from an unexpected source as a new threat arises among the residents of the town.

episodes.title: Choosing Day
episodes.description: The Matthews family must choose which of the two settlements they will join. Meanwhile, Jade comes to terms with his situation and Boyd is faced with an impossible decision that strikes at the very heart of life in the town.

episodes.title: A Rock and a Farway
episodes.description: Julie finds comfort in her new friends. Jim and Tabitha deal with their struggling marriage. Ethan ventures off into the forest with Victor. Father Khatri urges Boyd to embrace his role as leader. Sara receives another horrifying directive.

episodes.title: Silhouettes
episodes.description: Jim, Tabitha and Ethan begin asking questions about where they are in the hopes it may lead them home. Ellis and Fatima show Julie the lighter side of life in town. Jade struggles to make sense of their situation. Boyd seeks guidance.

episodes.title: Book 74
episodes.description: Boyd’s plan to head off into the forest provokes an unexpected response from Kenny. Jade enlists Jim’s help with an experiment. Tabitha makes a chilling discovery that sends her down a unique path searching for answers.

episodes.title: All Good Things
episodes.description: Father Khatri tells Boyd why he believes Sara may be useful. Jim and Tabitha find comfort in each other. Colony House celebrates the one-year anniversary of Fatima’s arrival with a party that goes terribly wrong.

episodes.title: Broken Windows, Open Doors
episodes.description: In the wake of another death, Boyd questions his decision to leave. Kenny steps up and embraces his new role. Jim rallies the town around his idea to build a radio tower. Fatima urges Ellis to make amends with his father before it’s too late.

episodes.title: Into the Woods
episodes.description: Boyd and Sara journey deeper into the forest than Boyd has ever gone, encountering new and terrifying mysteries. Jim’s confidence in the radio tower begins to wane. An unexpected tragedy causes Donna to unravel. Kenny and Kristi share a moment.

episodes.title: Oh, the Places We'll Go
episodes.description: Boyd draws strength from an unlikely source. Jim’s radio tower yields consequences which rock him to his very core. The hole that Tabitha has been digging leads her somewhere, and to someone, she could never have expected.

episodes.title: Strangers in a Strange Land
episodes.description: In Sheriff Boyd's absence, Donna and Kenny struggle to manage the chaos as a busload of unwitting newcomers arrives in town; Victor and Tabitha go on a chilling journey through the nightmarish labyrinth of tunnels beneath the town.

episodes.title: The Kindness of Strangers
episodes.description: A tense night in the diner as the residents and newcomers wait for sunrise; fear permeates the wreckage beneath the Matthews house, as Jim and Tom struggle to keep a panicked bus passenger quiet.

episodes.title: Tether
episodes.description: Kenny and Ellis make a grisly discovery out in the forest; Boyd struggles with the reality of what's happening to him.

episodes.title: This Way Gone
episodes.description: As Boyd's condition grows more alarming, Sara's return to town puts him in a difficult position; Jim shares a troubling new theory about the town.

episodes.title: Lullaby
episodes.description: Sara must face the music, as word of her return spreads through town; Victor and Jade strike an unlikely bargain.

episodes.title: Pas de Deux
episodes.description: Tensions run high at Colony House when word of the coming food shortage leaks out; a night at the clinic takes a terrifying turn.

episodes.title: Belly of the Beast
episodes.description: Boyd and Kristi seek to capitalize on a new discovery; Jim finds an unlikely ally in the volatile Randall.

episodes.title: Forest for the Trees
episodes.description: In their pursuit of the truth about the town, Jim and Randall hatch a dangerous plan; meanwhile, a new form of terror is brewing.

episodes.title: Ball of Magic Fire
episodes.description: Panic spreads through town as the residents face a chilling new threat to their survival; Jim realizes the magnitude of the mistake he made by enlisting Randall in his cause.

episodes.title: Once Upon a Time...
episodes.description: Boyd fears he may have finally run out of answers, as the residents of town prepare for the end; Tabitha clings to the belief that the children could be the key to their salvation.

episodes.title: Shatter
episodes.description: Boyd feels the town slipping away from him as the weather grows colder and the residents more desperate.

episodes.title: When We Go
episodes.description: Boyd struggles to find a path forward as the town says farewell to one of their own. Fatima's health takes a turn for the worse, while Tabitha finds help from an unlikely ally.

episodes.title: Mouse Trap
episodes.description: Kenny leads a group into the forest in search of food as Donna and Ellis try to talk Boyd out of a dangerous plan. Meanwhile, Tabitha makes a mind-bending discovery.

episodes.title: There and Back Again
episodes.description: Boyd is forced to make a tough decision when newcomers arrive in town at nightfall; Victor unearths memories from the past in the hopes of finding answers.

episodes.title: The Light of Day
episodes.description: Victor must face a painful reminder of his past; Julie looks for ways to cope with her trauma; Boyd struggles to keep the town safe as the residents begin to question his judgment; Tabitha tries to adjust to her new surroundings.

episodes.title: Scar Tissue
episodes.description: Fatima and Ellis make a big decision about her pregnancy; Boyd fears for the future of his family; Tensions rise in the Matthews house; Randall opens up to Marielle about his fears.

episodes.title: These Fragile Lives
episodes.description: The edges begin to fray as concerns about Fatima's pregnancy deepen; Jade follows a clue trail into the forest; Julie and Randall seek a bit of normalcy.

episodes.title: Thresholds
episodes.description: Accusations start flying and truths come to light in the aftermath of a tragedy; Victor struggles to recover long-buried memories about the town's past; Julie and Ethan search for answers about the mysterious ruins in the woods.

episodes.title: Revelations: Chapter One
episodes.description: Tensions are at an all-time high as the town residents learn that one of their own has gone missing.

episodes.title: Revelations: Chapter Two
episodes.description: Boyd is pushed to his limit as time begins to run out for someone he loves; Randall is haunted by his trauma and Victor reveals a hard truth; Tabitha's unlikely journey takes a shocking turn.

series.title: Kaiju No. 8
series.description: A man working a job far removed from his childhood dreams gets wrapped up in an unexpected situation - becoming a monster, he aims once again to fulfill his lifelong dream.

episodes.title: The Man Who Became a Kaiju
episodes.description: After abandoning his dream of joining the Defense Force, Kafka Hibino's job is disposing of Kaiju corpses. Memories of his friend Mina Ashiro, a captain in the Force, haunt him.

episodes.title: The Kaiju Who Defeats Kaiju
episodes.description: After turning into a Kaiju, Kafka is forced to flee. His escape is interrupted, however, by the arrival of another Kaiju...

episodes.title: Revenge Match
episodes.description: Kafka arrives for one last shot at the Defense Force entry exam - but can he pass while keeping his Kaiju powers a secret?

episodes.title: Fortitude 9.8
episodes.description: An unexpected incident during the exam forces Kafka to use his powers at the risk of revealing his secret.

episodes.title: Joining Up!
episodes.description: Kafka is now a member of the Defense Force, if not a full-fledged one. But Hoshina tells him he has three months to prove himself before he's fired.

episodes.title: Sagamihara Neutralization Operation at Daybreak
episodes.description: It's time for Kafka's first mission, and he witnesses the true power of the Defense Force when a Kaiju strikes a nearby city.

episodes.title: Kaiju No. 9
episodes.description: Reno and Iharu encounter a powerful humanoid Kaiju that quickly overwhelms them. Can help arrive in time?

episodes.title: Welcome to the Defense Force
episodes.description: Transformed into a Kaiju to save friends, Kafka confronts Hoshina, who attacks him relentlessly. A gripping battle unfolds as Kafka fights for survival.

episodes.title: Raid on Tachikawa Base
episodes.description: Tachikawa base comes under a devastating aerial attack from a powerful Kaiju, forcing the Defense Force to confront the monstrous threat.

episodes.title: Secret Revealed
episodes.description: When the Defense Force is in danger, Kafka is forced to choose between keeping his secret and saving his comrades.

episodes.title: Kaiju No. 8 Captured
episodes.description: Kaiju No. 8 is captured, and Kafka is at the mercy of the Defense Force's most important leaders.

episodes.title: Kafka Hibino
episodes.description: Kafka's final fate is determined as the monster within him tries to take control.

episodes.title: Kaiju Weapon
episodes.description: Kafka goes on a mission with his new squad and faces Kaiju No. 9 once again.

episodes.title: The Next Generation's Trial
episodes.description: A challenge begins for the next generation of the Defense Force.

episodes.title: The Strongest Division
episodes.description: Kaiju No. 9 appears for the third time, splitting in two and overwhelming the Defense Force.

episodes.title: The Man Called Isao Shinomiya
episodes.description: After achieving his transformation, Kafka faces his greatest challenge yet in the battle against the powerful Kaiju No. 9.

episodes.title: I Want to Be Strong
episodes.description: Narumi and Kikoru's resolve is renewed. Kafka is forced to face the price that comes with his power.

episodes.title: Compatible User
episodes.description: Reno Ichikawa has been chosen to wield the power of Numbers Weapon 6, the most powerful of them all.

episodes.title: Wall
episodes.description: Iharu and Reno's trust in each other becomes a powerful weapon that leads them in battle.

episodes.title: Destiny
episodes.description: Kafka learns to fight without having to rely on Kaiju No. 8's power.

episodes.title: Omen
episodes.description: A horde of Kaiju appear all over Tokyo at the same time.

episodes.title: Cataclysms
episodes.description: The fight against No. 9's Kaiju kicks off in full force.

episodes.title: Second Wave
episodes.description: The Defense Forces suffer severe damage from a fortitude 9.0 Kaiju that appear at the capital.

series.title: Jujutsu Kaisen
series.description: A boy swallows a cursed talisman - the finger of a demon - and becomes cursed himself. He enters a shaman's school to be able to locate the demon's other body parts and thus exorcise himself.

episodes.title: Ryomen Sukuna
episodes.description: As Itadori Yuuji cares for his grandpa, Jujutsu sorcerer Fushiguro Megumi worries that he's carrying a cursed object of rare power. The Occult club messes with something far beyond their understanding

episodes.title: For Myself
episodes.description: Following the delay of his secret execution, Yuji is brought to Tokyo Metropolitan Curse Technical School. He's interviewed by the principal, who tests his convictions to see if he's worthy of becoming a sorcerer.

episodes.title: Girl of Steel
episodes.description: A new freshman arrives to join the Itadori and Fushiguro group. She barely arrives in Tokyo, and is already put to the test on her first exorcism mission.

episodes.title: Curse Womb Must Die
episodes.description: The three Jujutsu first years are sent to rescue inmates of a detention center haunted by a Cursed Womb. With the potential to spawn a Special Grade Cursed Spirit, the young Sorcerers are faced with the choice to run or die.

episodes.title: Curse Womb Must Die -II-
episodes.description: Yuuji fails to regain control of his own body, forcing Fushiguro to take drastic measures. Meanwhile, the school's veterans finally introduce themselves.

episodes.title: After Rain
episodes.description: Yuji and Sukuna have a conversation outside the material plane, while Gojo expresses his desire to bring about a revolution in the Jujutsu world - through education.

episodes.title: Assault
episodes.description: While in transit, Gojo is suddenly attacked by the special-grade cursed spirit, Jogo. After launching several attacks that never hit, Jogo comes face-to-face with Gojo's strength.

episodes.title: Boredom
episodes.description: Kugisaki and Fushiguro continue to prepare for the Exchange Event, but some visitors from Kyoto decide to jump the gun and test their colleagues in the capital.

episodes.title: Small Fry and Reverse Retribution
episodes.description: Junpei is a fragile boy, who suffers at school, and who is about to find refuge in the world of curses. Meanwhile, Yuuji investigates murders alongside a new partner: Nanami.

episodes.title: Idle Transfiguration
episodes.description: Itadori's assignment is to investigate whether or not Junpei possesses sorcerer potential or is just an ordinary person. If he shows he has potential, he is to bring him in for questioning. Kento confronts the curse that is guiding Junpei.

episodes.title: Narrow-minded
episodes.description: Kento's fight with the curse that is manipulating Junpei goes into overtime. Itadori makes contact with Junpei.

episodes.title: To You, Someday
episodes.description: Yuji tries to reach what's left of Junpei's heart with both his fists and his words.

episodes.title: Tomorrow
